price: Nokorε, asεdeε a εda me soͻ ne sε me nka biribi nto Nyankopͻn so gyesε Nokorε no nko ara. Ampa sε, mede nyinasoͻ pefee firi mo Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ aberε mo, enti ma Israel mma no kwan na wͻne me nkͻ.
arabic: حَقِيقٌ عَلَىٰٓ أَن لَّآ أَقُولَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلۡحَقَّۚ قَدۡ جِئۡتُكُم بِبَيِّنَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ فَأَرۡسِلۡ مَعِيَ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: ḥaqīqun ʿalā an lā aqūla ʿalā al-lahi illā al-ḥaqa qad ji'tukum bibayyinatin min rabbikum fa-arsil maʿiya banī is'rāīla
